alert.note: Alert for Muhlenberg (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 07 at 4:53AM EST until March 10 at 8:12PM EST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following river in Kentucky... Green River at Paradise and Calhoun. .Recent rainfall in the basin has caused additional rises on the Green River, and at Paradise and Calhoun. For the Green River...including Paradise, Calhoun...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM EARLY THIS MORNING THROUGH THURSDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Green River at Paradise. * WHEN...Until Thursday evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:15 AM CST Monday the stage was 381.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 382.5 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage early Thursday afternoon. - Flood stage is 380.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
